name: Mycolid Commoner
description: The Mycolid Commoner is a small, non-combatant plant creature with fungal biology, noted for its stealth and perceptive abilities.
memorable: Its ability to communicate telepathically with kin and inflict potent poison makes it unique.
goals: To support its kin and maintain stealth within its ecosystem.
relations: Often found in communities with other Mycolids.
environment: Typically inhabits forested or overgrown areas rich in decaying vegetation.
strengths: Possesses keen senses, good perception, and a strong poison defense mechanism.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma with below average mobility.
attacks: Gardening Pick delivers piercing and poison damage; Slowing Spores hinder opponents and deal poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Fungal Toxicity, which punishes melee attackers with poison effects.
senses: Has keen senses that allow it to perceive its surroundings within a radius of 120 feet.
skills: Excels in stealth with a high rating of 14.
additional_information: Can heal using Fetid Feast by consuming carrion or rotting vegetation.
Resistant to exhaustion and immunity to several debilitating conditions.
Telepathy ranges up to 120 feet when communicating with other Mycolids.
Strong scouting potential due to high wisdom and perception.
Acts as a non-combatant support unit in Mycolid communities.
test_queries: small plant creature with poison abilities
slow-moving mushroom creature with stealth skills
fungal plant found in forest ecosystems
